notes: Numbers are rounded to the nearest 50. Standard errors are rounded up to the nearest 25. Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Residence location is based on reported living location on 1 February 2021.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Doctorate Recipients, 2021.
